name: Katie Laughlin
text: Their personal pizzas are my favorite. Also their buffet from 11am-2pm on Monday-Saturday is wonderful. All you can eat pizza, salad and soda for about $8.00 I always leave a $2.00 tip. So 10 bucks for about 5 slices and 2 servings of salad and a refill of soda. Staff is great too. Love this place.

name: SaBreena Lovelady
text: Friendly and attentive staff. I went in and was unsure of what I wanted. The cashier was patient and understanding and explained my options. I would visit again but would like more vegan options!

name: Casey Myhro
text: The pizza is always fresh. They're always bringing a fresh one out of the oven.

name: ryan roehn
text: I've been to many pizza factories this one seems to use different ingredients more on the cheap side, the buffet pizza for some reason the cheese is gross and the fountain drinks are always out. They don't remove the old pizza in the buffet either. Don't waste your time here

name: Aditya Paranthaman
text: Food was pretty good for the price. They had an all you can eat for 8 bucks. Pizza was really fresh.

name: XxLily Gacha_AnimexX
text: Great service and food was good for the price!  Lourdes was very attentive to our needs!

name: Rebeca P.
text: 4 of us showed up, I'm out of state, and ordered 2 large pizzas and got them pretty quickly!  Incredibly delicious and I would come here again.  They have football playing here on a tv above.  Friendly staff

name: Joe Janott
text: Great service, the lunch special was honored on a Sunday. I will definitely be back!

name: MR. DIRTY
text: Bomb ass pizza and environment highly recommended that you try out there got pizza and wonderful taste from the sauce. Best pizza so far

name: Todd Paradise
text: Pizza buffet is 4 kinds of pizza and that's it. Really need more variety!

name: Chris Brown
text: Good place to eat but need a better AC

name: Judi Diamant
text: Wanted to try it out but they won't deliver. So I won't be finding out if it's any good. Ever.

name: G D
text: Great Pizza. But they seem to have closed

name: Dylan Thomas
text: Pizza was okay but hot damn less than $8 for all you can eat pizza, salad, and soda?!

name: master chief
text: good pizza bad service.very disappointing how it takes longer than said everytime I order. Ranges from 30 minutes to an hour late every time. when they quote 20 minutes it should not take an hour to get my pizza.

name: Ray Bargas
text: Had the 4 person meal deal with my family. Perfect ammount of food.

name: Randy Hayes
text: Great lunch buffet. Can't beat it for $8

name: Carlo Ruiz
text: Another place we always stop be on our way home. Pizza and people are great ðŸ˜Š

name: Christopher Rogers
text: Has to be the worst Pizza Factory I've been to an I've been to a lot of them. It's nothing like a original Pizza Factory. Barely any setting room, ther turkey sandwiches  are brown meat they don't use white breast meat... No beer .. etc.etc restroom has no TP, no soap , and no paper towels ðŸ˜•

name: Keianna Rodgers
text: very nice place. only problem I had was my pizza was way to greasy.

name: Charmaine Gercke
text: The service was friendly and fast. The pizza is SUPER.

name: Vince Colavitti
text: Went by Saturday night at 7pm and it was closed.  Maybe permanently.  Phone has been disconnected.

name: Zack Aragon
text: What a surprise that this place was delicious.

name: Samuel Nevarez
text: This place is stringy with all you could eat pizza.  Also, the service and food is horrible!
